item.title: INTERCEPT PHARMACEUTICALS INC 10-K
item.description: INTERCEPT PHARMACEUTICALS INC, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 02, 2023 had 57396 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 649 instances oca - 525 instances product - 418 instances ocaliva - 401 instances company - 370 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
